captions.name: IRA

captions.line: It’s got to go. This – look. Sick of it.
I just need it to be - not this anymore.

That sort of attention seeking won’t help

I’ll go grab some, can you roll for me?

you don’t have to answer, I’m/

captions.line: looks like fun. I wish I was brave enough to try

How is my little fruit blossom today?

be that bright little shining star
